GetFacilitiesBySearchCriteria.CommandText: select * from Facilities where Name like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%') OR Address like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%') OR Phone like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%') OR City like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%') OR Country like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%') OR ZipCode like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%') OR CourtTypes like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%') OR Description like concat(concat('%',@SearchCriteria), '%')

GetReservationId.CommandText: select Id from reservations where CourtId = @CourtId and PriceId = @PriceId and UserId = @UserId and StatusId = @StatusId and Comments = @Comments and StartTime=@StartTime and EndTime=@EndTime and FacilityId = @FacilityId and PlayersNo = @PlayersNo and SlotNo = @SlotNo;
select Id from reservations where CourtId = @CourtId and FacilityId = @FacilityId and PlayersNo = @PlayersNo and SlotNo = @SlotNo;

UpdateReservation.CommandText: Update Reservations set CourtId=@CourtId,Priceid=@PriceId,UserId=@UserId,StatusId=@StatusId,Comments=@Comments,StartTime=@StartTime,EndTime=@EndTime,Facilityid=@FacilityId,PlayersNo=@PlayersNo, SlotNo = @SlotNo where Id = @Id;

GetReservationBySlotAndCourt.CommandText: select * from reservations where SlotNo = @Slot and CourtId=@Court;
